漢世支讖譯)演道俗業經一卷(晉世沙門法堅譯)決道俗經一卷(晉世竺法護譯)菩薩生地經一卷(一名差摩竭經)(吳黃武年支謙譯)菩薩道樹經一卷(一名私呵昧經名道樹三昧經)(一名私呵末經一吳世支謙譯)度一切諸佛境界智嚴經一卷(梁天監年曼陀羅仙共僧伽婆羅於陽州譯)照明三昧經一卷(晉世竺法護譯)寶網經一卷(一名寶網童子經)(晉世竺法護譯)無量義經一卷(南齊建元年沙門曇無伽陀耶舍於陽州譯)廣義法門經一卷(陳世真諦於晉安佛力寺譯)殖眾德本經一卷(晉世竺法護譯)觀彌勒上生兜率天經一卷(北涼世沮渠安陽侯譯)無量壽觀經一卷(宋元嘉年沙門畺良耶舍於陽州譯)觀普賢菩薩行法經一卷(宋元嘉年沙門曇無蜜多於陽州譯)觀藥王藥上二菩薩經一卷(宋元嘉年畺良耶舍譯)觀世音觀經一卷(沮渠安陽侯於高昌譯)請觀世音消伏毒害陀羅尼經一卷(宋世外國舶主竺難提譯)觀世音懺悔除罪呪經一卷(南齊永明年沙門法意譯)金剛上味陀羅尼經一卷(後魏世佛陀扇多於洛陽譯)無崖際持法門經一卷(晉世法堅譯)第一義法勝經一卷(後魏興和年留支譯)正恭敬經一卷(一名佛說威德陀羅尼中說)(後魏世佛陀扇多譯)鹿母經一卷(晉世竺法護譯)鹿子經一卷(吳建興年支謙譯)除恐災患經一卷(魏世沙門白延譯)法沒盡經一卷(一名空寂菩薩所問經)(晉世竺法護譯)八吉祥經一卷(宋元嘉年求那跋陀羅於荊州譯)小法沒盡經一卷(晉世竺法護譯)十二門大方等經一卷(吳黃武年支謙譯)溫室洗浴眾僧經一卷(晉世竺法護譯)四不可得經一卷(晉世竺法護譯)諸德福田經一卷(一云福田經)(晉世沙門法炬共法立譯)過去佛分衛經一卷(晉世竺法護譯)出家功德經一卷(吳世支謙譯)右一百三十三經並是原本一譯其間非不分摘卷品別譯獨行而大本無虧故宜定錄。

source_sentence: 眾經異譯二(此分有二一大本異譯二別品異譯)合一百九十五部五百三十卷悲華經十卷(北涼沮渠蒙遜世曇無讖於姑臧譯)大悲分陀利經八卷右二經同本異譯。
translation: There are two different translations of the scriptures (there are two major ones and two special ones), the one hundred and ninety-five part, five hundred and thirty volume Compassionate Flower Sutra in ten volumes (translated in Guzang by Juqu Mengxun of Northern Liang and Tan Wuqian), and the eight volume Great Compassionate Parthenogenesis Sutra in the same text and two different translations of the right sutra.

source_sentence: 妙法蓮華經七卷(後秦弘始年羅什譯)正法華經七卷(晉太康年竺法護譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Sutra of the Lotus of the Wonderful Dharma in seven volumes (translated by Rāsh in the year of Hongsi in the late Qin Dynasty), Sutra of the True Dharma Flower in seven volumes (translated by Zhu Fahou in the year of Taikang in the Jin Dynasty), and the right two sūtras in the same edition.

source_sentence: 楞伽阿跋多羅經四卷(宋元嘉年求那跋羅譯)入楞伽經十卷(後魏世菩提留支譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: The Laṅkâvatāra-sūtra in four volumes (translated by Kunabhadra in the Song Dynasty) and the Laṅkâvatāra-sūtra in ten volumes (translated by Bodhiruci in the Latter Wei Dynasty) are both variant translations of the same text.

source_sentence: 賢劫經十卷(一云賢劫三昧經或七卷)(晉元康年竺法護譯)新賢劫經七卷(後秦弘始年羅什譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: The Sutra of the Good Years, 10 volumes (a translation of the Samādhi-sūtra of the Good Years or seven volumes) (translated by Zhu Fahou in the Yuankang period of the Jin Dynasty), and the New Sutra of the Good Years, 7 volumes (translated by Rāsh in the Hongsi period of the Latter Qin Dynasty), the right two sūtras have the same text and are translated differently.

source_sentence: 菩薩行方便境界神通變化經三卷
translation: Sutra on the Transformation of the Bodhisattva's Practices, Methods, and Realms of Spiritual Powers (3 vols.)

source_sentence: 大薩遮尼乾子經八卷(後魏世菩提留支譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Mahāsatya-nirgrantha-sūtra, 8 volumes (Latter Wei Translation by Bodhiruci) The right two sūtras are in the same edition and in different translations.

source_sentence: 海龍王經四卷(晉世竺法護譯)
translation: Sutra of the Sea Dragon King, 4 volumes (Translated by Zhu Fahou in the Jin Dynasty)

source_sentence: 新海龍王經四卷(北涼世曇無讖譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Sutra of the New Sea Dragon King, 4 volumes (translated by Shidan Wuzhuan in Northern Liang) The right two sūtras have the same text and are translated differently.

source_sentence: 大樹緊那羅王所問經四卷(後秦弘始年羅什譯)屯真陀羅所問經三卷(或二卷)(後漢建寧年支讖譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Sutra of the Questions of the King of the Mahādruma Kiṃnara, 4 volumes (translated by Rāsh in the Hongsi era of the late Qin dynasty); Sutra of the Questions of Tunzendra, 3 volumes (or 2) (translated by Zhi Quan in the Jianning era of the late Han dynasty); the right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 持人菩薩所問經三卷(晉世竺法護譯)持世經四卷(亦名法印經)(後秦弘始年羅什譯)右二經本同異譯。
translation: The Sutra of the Questions of the Bodhisattva Who Holds People (3 volumes) (translated by Zhu Faju in the Jin Dynasty) and the Sutra of the Dharma Seal (4 volumes) (also called the Dharma Seal Sutra) (translated by Rāsh in the Latter Qin Dynasty in the year of Hongsi) are both the same and different translations of the right two sūtras.

source_sentence: 弘道廣顯三昧經四卷(晉永嘉年竺法護譯)阿耨達龍王經二卷(一名阿耨請佛)(晉世竺法護譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Hongdao guangxian sanmei jing 4 rolls (translated by Zhu Fahou in the Jin dynasty's Yongjia year), anuoda longwang jing 2 rolls (a translation by Zhu Fahou in the Jin dynasty), and the right two sūtras have the same text and different translations.

source_sentence: 普超三昧經四卷(晉太康年竺法護譯)阿闍世王經二卷(後漢世支讖譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Puchao sanmei jing 4 volumes (translated by Zhu Fafao in the year of Taikang of the Jin dynasty), Ajātaśatru kings jing 2 volumes (translated by Latter Han Dynasty's Zhiqian), the right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 等集眾德三昧經二卷(或三卷)(晉世竺法護譯)集一切福德三昧經三卷右二經同本異譯。
translation: Samādhi-sūtra on the Equal Collection of Various Virtues, 2 volumes (or 3) (translated by Zhu Fahou in the Jin period); Samādhi-sūtra on the Collection of All Virtues, 3 volumes (translated by Zhu Fahou in the Latter Han period); the right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 聖善住意天子所問經三卷(後魏世留支譯)如幻三昧經三卷(或二卷)(晉世竺法護譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Sutra of the Questions of the Emperor Shōtoku (Latter Wei Translation by Shiliuzi): Sutra of the Samādhi of Numinous Illusions, 3 volumes (or 2) (Jin Translation by Zhu Fahou): The right two sūtras have the same text and are translated differently.

source_sentence: 須真天子經二卷(晉太始年竺法護譯)須真天子經二卷(亦名須真天子問四事經)(晉太始二年沙門曇摩羅剎共文慧等譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: *Suzhen denzi jing 2 rolls (translated by Zhu Fahou in the first year of the Jin Dynasty) *Suzhen denzi jing 2 rolls (also called Suzhen denzi wensi jing) (translated by the ascetic Dharmarakṣa together with Wenhui and others in the second year of the Jin Dynasty) *These two sūtras are the same text and have been translated differently.

source_sentence: 無極寶三昧經一卷(晉永嘉年竺法護譯)寶如來三昧經二卷右二經同本異譯。
translation: Wuzi baosanmei jing 1 roll (Translated by Zhu Fahou in the Yongjia year of Jin) Baoluo rulai sanmei jing 2 rolls (Right two sūtras in the same edition with different translations).

source_sentence: 慧上菩薩問大善權經二卷(晉太康年竺法護譯)大乘方便經二卷(晉世竺難提釋)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Huishang pusa wenda shanquan jing 2 volumes (Translated by Zhu Fahou in the year of Taikang of Jin), dasheng fangbian jing 2 volumes (Translated by Zhu Nandi of Jin), the right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 文殊師利現寶藏經二卷(晉太始年竺法護譯)大方廣寶篋經二卷右二經同本異譯。
translation: Wenshushilipangsangzang jing 2 rolls (Translated by Zhu Fahou in the Jin dynasty) Dafangbaoqie jing 2 rolls (Translated by Zhu Nandi in the Jin dynasty) The right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 奮迅王問經二卷(後魏世留支譯)
translation: The Sutra of the Questions of King Fenxun (2 volumes) (Translated by Shiliuzhi in the Latter Wei Dynasty)

source_sentence: 自在王經二卷(後秦弘始年羅什譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Zizaiwang jing 2 rolls (Translated by Rāsh in the year of Hongsi of the late Qin) The right two sūtras have the same text and are translated differently.

source_sentence: 佛昇忉利天為母說法經卷上(少下卷)(晉太康年竺法護譯)道神足無極變化經二卷(晉太康年安法欽譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Sutra on the Ascension of the Buddha to the Dignified Heaven to Explain the Dharma to His Mother, Volume 1 (lesser of the two volumes) (Translated by Zhu Fahou in the Jìn Dynasty) Two Fascicle Sutra on the Spiritual Feet of the Way and the Infinite Changes (Translated by An Fachin in the Jìn Dynasty) The right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 超日明三昧經一卷(晉太始年竺法護譯)超日明經二卷(晉世聶承遠重出)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Chaosi ming sanmei jing 1 roll (Translated by Zhu Fahou in the Jin dynasty year of Taishikang) Chaosi ming jing 2 rolls (Reprinted by Jin Shi Nie Chengyuan) The right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 成具光明定意經一卷(後漢靈帝世支曜譯)成具光明定意經一卷(後漢世支讖譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Chengguo guangming dingmei jing 1 roll (Latter Han Dynasty translation by Zhi Yao) Chengguo guangming dingmei jing 1 roll (Latter Han Dynasty translation by Zhi Qian) Right two sūtras in the same edition with different translations.

source_sentence: 金剛般若波羅蜜經一卷(後秦弘始年羅什譯)金剛般若波羅蜜經一卷(後魏世菩提留支譯)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Vajraprātimokṣa-sūtra in One Volume (translated by Rāsh in the Latter Qin Dynasty in the year of Hongsi) Vajraprātimokṣa-sūtra in One Volume (translated by Bodhiruci in the Latter Wei Dynasty) The right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 須賴經一卷(或名須賴菩薩經)(吳黃武年支謙譯)須賴經一卷(魏世白延譯)右二經同本異譯。

translation: Xiangxu jietuo jing 1 roll (a minor part of the sutra on the liberation of profound honey) (translated by Qunabhadra in the Song Dynasty) and jiejie jing 1 roll (also a minor part of the sutra on profound mystery) (translated by Chen Shi Zhendi) The right two sūtras are special translations of separate parts of the sutra on profound mystery.

source_sentence: 右一經是普超經奉鉢品別譯。
translation: The right-hand sūtra is a special translation of the Fengbo pin of the Puchao sūtra.

source_sentence: 薩曇分陀利經一卷(是法華經寶塔品少分及提婆達多品)右一經是法華經別品殊譯。
translation: One volume of the Saddharma-puṇḍarīka-sūtra (from the lesser part of the Jewel Tower Chapter of the Lotus Sutra and the Devadatta Chapter), the right-hand sūtra is a special translation of the distinctive qualities of the Lotus Sutra.

source_sentence: 般舟三昧經一卷(是後十品)(後漢世支讖別譯)跋陀菩薩經一卷(是初四品)佛說般舟三昧念佛章經一卷(是行品)右三經是般舟三昧經別品別譯此前三十三經並是諸經別品異譯。
translation: The Banzhou sanmei jing is a one-volume translation of the last ten chapters (a later Han Dynasty translation by Shizi Qian), the Bhadrapāla jing is a one-volume translation of the first four chapters, and the Banzhou sanmei nianshi zhang jing is a one-volume translation of the practice chapter (a practice chapter).

source_sentence: 右一百九十五經。
translation: The one hundred and ninety-five sūtras on the right are a translation of the previous thirty-three sūtras and are variant translations of separate sections of the sūtras.

source_sentence: 並是重譯。
translation: They are all re-translations.

source_sentence: 或全本別翻。
translation: Some translate the whole text separately, while others cut off separate parts for special translation.

source_sentence: 或割品殊譯。
translation: Some are separate translations of the whole text, and some are fragmentary translations of the sutras.

source_sentence: 然而世變風移。
translation: However, the world has changed and the wind has shifted.

source_sentence: 質文迭舉既無梵本校讎。
translation: Since there's no synopsis of the Sanskrit text, it's appropriate for them all to be included in the definitive record.

source_sentence: 自宜俱入定錄。
translation: It's appropriate for them all to be included in the definitive record.

translation: The right eleven sūtras were reprinted from a lost translation.

source_sentence: 前一百三十四經。
translation: The first one hundred and thirty-four sūtras were mistranslated.

source_sentence: 並是失譯。
translation: They were all lost translations.

source_sentence: 雖復遺落譯人時事。
translation: Although the events of the translator's time have been left out, the ancient records exist.

source_sentence: 而古錄備有。
translation: However, the ancient records are fully available.

source_sentence: 且義理無違。
translation: Moreover, there's no discrepancy between the meaning and principle.

source_sentence: 亦為定錄。
translation: It's also a definitive record.

source_sentence: 眾經目錄卷第一
translation: Catalogue of the Buddhist Texts, Volume 1

source_sentence: 淨六波羅蜜經一卷　晉世佛陀跋陀羅譯遺日說般若經一卷　後漢世支讖譯演道俗業經一卷　晉世沙門法堅譯決道俗經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯菩薩生地經一卷(一名差摩竭經)　吳黃武年支謙譯菩薩道樹經一卷(一名私呵昧經一名私阿末經一名道樹三昧經)　吳世支謙譯度一切諸佛境界智嚴經一卷　梁天監年曼陀羅仙共僧伽婆羅於揚州譯照明三昧經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯寶網經一卷(一名寶網童子經)　晉世沙門竺法護譯無量義經一卷　南齊建元年沙門曇無伽陀耶舍於揚州譯廣義法門經一卷　陳世真諦於晉安佛力寺譯殖眾德本經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯觀彌勒上生兜率天經一卷　北涼世沮渠安陽侯譯無量壽觀經一卷　宋元嘉年沙門畺良耶舍於揚州譯觀普賢菩薩行法經一卷　宋元嘉年沙門曇無蜜多於揚州譯觀藥王藥上二菩薩經一卷　宋元嘉年畺良耶舍譯觀世音觀經一卷　沮渠安陽侯於高昌譯滅十方冥經一卷　晉元熙年沙門竺法護譯雜垢蓋經一卷菩薩十住經一卷心明經一卷慧明經　晉世沙門竺法護譯光明三昧經一卷　後漢世支讖譯月燈三昧經一卷(一名文殊師利菩薩十事行一名逮惠三昧經)　宋沙門釋先公譯嚴淨定經一卷(一名序世經)　晉世沙門竺法護譯不思議光菩薩所說經一卷(一名無思議光孩童菩薩經)　晉世沙門竺法護譯尊勝菩薩入無量門陀羅尼經一卷　齊世居士萬天懿於相州譯文殊師利問菩薩署經一卷(一名署經)　後漢靈帝世支讖譯佛說德光太子經一卷(一名賴吒問光德太子經)　晉太始年沙門竺法護譯幻士仁賢經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯寶施女經一卷(一名須摩提法律三昧經)　晉世沙門竺法護譯三密底耶經一卷　宋明帝世沙門法眷於廣州譯施燈功德經一卷(一名然燈經)　齊世沙門耶舍譯菩薩訶色欲經一卷　後秦弘始年沙門羅什譯人本欲生經一卷　後漢桓帝世沙門安世高譯人所從來經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯不增不減經一卷　後魏世沙門留支譯眾祐經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯佛語經一卷無字寶篋經一卷　後魏世沙門留支譯如來師子吼經一卷　後魏世菩提留支共佛陀扇多譯三轉月明經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯十法經一卷　梁普通年沙門僧伽婆羅揚州譯十等藏經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯不必定入定入印經一卷　後魏世沙門留支譯魔逆經一卷　晉太康年沙門竺法護譯濟諸方等學經一卷菩薩行五十緣身經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯內藏百寶經一卷　後漢靈帝世支讖譯惟逮菩薩經一卷　晉惠帝世沙門帛法祖譯彌勒菩薩所問本願經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯文殊師利巡行經一卷　後魏世沙門留支譯溥首童經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯文殊師利說般若波羅蜜經一卷　梁天監年沙門曼陀羅仙譯　後秦弘始年沙門羅什譯阿閦佛國經二卷(一名佛剎菩薩學成經或一卷)　後漢建和年支讖於洛陽譯般舟三昧經二卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯迦葉經二卷　後魏世王子月婆首那譯無上依經二卷　陳世沙門真諦於廣州譯未曾有因緣經二卷　蕭齊沙門曇景譯猛施經一卷(一名猛施道地經)　晉世竺法護譯太子須大拏經一卷　晉世沙門法堅譯太子慕魄經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯金色王經一卷　後魏世留支譯無憂王經一卷　宋元嘉年求那跋陀羅譯摩訶摩耶經一卷　蕭齊沙門曇景譯阿闍世女經一卷大淨法門經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯勝鬘師子吼一乘大方便經一卷　宋元嘉年求那跋陀羅於揚州譯須摩提菩薩經一卷(一名須摩提經)　晉世沙門竺法護譯金益長者子經一卷梵女首意經一卷　晉世沙門竺法護譯差摩婆帝受記經一卷　後魏世菩提留支譯獨證自誓三昧經一卷(一名如來自誓三昧經)　晉世沙門竺法護譯月明菩薩經一卷(一名日明童子經)　吳黃武年支謙譯
